title: Earning IP
body:
Hey, guys. So I spent my 5 months of playing League as a boosted bonobo when it came to champions. All the champions I have 'bought' are worth no more than 1350 IP and as soon as I hit 1700 IP, it's the mystery champion shard for me, so most of the Champions I have are from hextech. So, in memory of a friend who has passed on, I want to main Lux as she had been a Lux main herself, but, knowing my impulsive behavior, I'll probably blow away the IP. 

Point being, I want to know the fastest way of earning IP as I only play one hour a day of league. I want to have 3150 IP, so I can buy Lux ASAP. What is the quickest way of earning IP.

Please DO NOT take this as a gifting request, I only want Lux to remember my close friend by. If you are feeling generous, go ahead and gift but it's not what I really want you to do.

EDIT 1: I currently have 1008 IP

replies.body:
Like BarryButcher has said, ARAM with an IP boost is the best way to go. 

* IP boosted (quite cheap in RP)- double IP gains
* ARAM- Shorter games, can get more in a short space of time
* Play as a 5man- small IP boost for players playing in a premade

ARAM with an IP Boost.

Also getting a champ shard is only good for getting 6300 champions. Otherwise its not really efficient to buy shards.
